segments.text: I'm really starting to feel annoyed by this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The amount of water gushing out of that sink is ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a colossal puddle all over the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage to those cabinets is going to be extensive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone stopping this leak?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying her plate, completely oblivious to the destruction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me want to reach in and turn off the faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the slippery surface that's creating for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the water sloshing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of it makes me quite uncomfortable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of inattention is just infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR
